resources.string: Dota 2 API is currently down. Matches will not update until service resumes.
If you enjoy using {0}, please take a moment to rate it.\n Thanks for your support!
Are You sure You want to delete {0} from Your lists?
Add players to your group list \n (press + after searching for player on SEARCH tab),\n to see them here.

If You would like to see your statistics, 
 You need to open Dota 2 client, 
 click Settings icon->Options 
 and set Expose Public Match Data to On. 
 After some time You'll be able to search game history by your dota2 nickname.
There was an error during loading
Data loading error. Please, check your internet connection and try again later.
If You want to watch live streams, You need to install Twitch app from play market. Do You want to install it?

Guides contains 2 parts:
 -Items
 -Abilities
 On Items tab You can add up to 6 game stages. For each item You can add a tooltip (click on added item).
 On Abilities tab You should set, which ability should be taken and on which level. By clicking on ability icon You can add a tooltip for it.
 After saving guide You can send it to me via email (from Hero guides screen), so I can add it to apk. I won't add guides without tooltips!
Finished loading.\n If You can see this message, then your Google Play services app needs to update. Update it from Play market and then restart Dota 2 Info app.
Cannot get match history for a user that hasn\'t allowed it
You\'ll have 3 attempts and 60 seconds time limit. \n Each correct answer will increase your time limit for 0.5 sec.
Are You sure, You wanna delete this part?

Counterpick function uses TruePicker services api.
 That means, that Counterpick works only when internet-connection is enabled.
 Counterpick does not guarantee You victory. 
 All questions about suggested heroes please send to TruePicker.com's support.
Twitch.tv stream watching function is in a beta phase.\n So please send all bug and error reports at my email which can be found in About section.
